name: arbiter
description: Research-grade CLI for studying LLM behavior as a distribution.

scripts.gen:types: json2ts -i schemas/config.schema.json -o src/generated/config.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/manifest.schema.json -o src/generated/manifest.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/question.schema.json -o src/generated/question.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/trial.schema.json -o src/generated/trial.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/parsed-output.schema.json -o src/generated/parsed-output.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/embedding.schema.json -o src/generated/embedding.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/convergence-trace.schema.json -o src/generated/convergence-trace.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/aggregates.schema.json -o src/generated/aggregates.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/cluster-state.schema.json -o src/generated/cluster-state.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */"
scripts.check:types: npm run gen:types && git diff --exit-code src/generated
